
# Farmers Assistant

The main aim of this project is to provide an assistance to farmers.
This is a web application which predicts the type of disease the plant is infected when a photo of leaf of the corresponding plant is given as input.It also gves description,Precautions and Remedies for the disease.

It also does prediction on two other things:
   Prediction of suitable crop when the necessary parameters are given as input
Prediction of suitable fertilizer depending on soil conditions
## Demo

https://drive.google.com/file/d/13nE1tZt_hULNay7p3wZnxdSiBT1RdXXY/view?usp=sharing

  
## Run Locally

Clone the project

```bash
  git clone https://github.com/milangeorge2000/Farmers-Assistant/tree/main
```

Go to the project directory

```bash
  cd Farmers-Assistant
```

Install dependencies

```bash
  pip install -r requirements.txt
```

Start the server

```bash
  python app.py
```
